Chapter 7 Big data In this Chapter, we are going to review different approaches to handle and perform analyses on data that does not fit in memory. We will illustrate the different tools with data from the MovieLens datasets (https://grouplens.org/datasets/movielens/) that collect datasets from the website https://movielens.org/. There are datasets of different sizes notably: Small (1MB) Benchmark (~190MB zipped) 7.1 Sampling 7.2 Pure R solutions 7.3 JVM solutions 7.3.1 h20 7.3.2 Spark
